title: Covid-19 Vaccine Frequently Asked Questions
content:
Authorization or Approval
– Before vaccines are available to people, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) reviews data from clinical trials. FDA has determined
COVID-19 vaccines
meet FDA’s safety and efficacy standards and has granted those vaccines
Emergency Use Authorizations (EUAs)
or full FDA approval.
T
racking Safety Using Vaccine Monitoring Systems
